A simple calculator app, created as a group project.
 The user can perform all the basic mathematical operations and calculate the area of a circle, the volume of a cylinder or the pythagorean theorem with the mathematical formulas clearly shown.
 The result is shown in a specific field and the user can correct or clear all the fields.
 The link to the GitHub repository is in the top left corner of the page.

An interactive menu for a fictional restaurant, the main page leads to the different types of courses.
 A navigation arrow permits movement between all three categories and a info button describes the meaning of all possible allergens.
 At the bottom the user can click on the telephone number or the e-mail and activate the appropriate app on the device to call or mail the restaurant. 
 The link to the GitHub repository is in the top left corner of the page.

A simple app to calculate the user\'s BMI (Body Mass Index). It prompts the input of two values, height and weight, and then it performs a simple mathematical operation.\n The height value can be written in cm, m or as a whole number without invalidating the calculation.\n The link to the GitHub repository is in the top left corner of the page.

An app to take simple notes and create shopping lists, built following the MVC architecture.
 The notes are saved as text files in the device memory and can be modified and erased. The app checks if two note names repeat and corrects in case.
 The shopping list function allows the user to add products, remove them and it can be re-opened and modified or erased later.
 The link to the GitHub repository is in the top left corner of the page.

Originally from Italy, I moved to Sweden in 2016.
 While always being interested in technology and programming, I didn't pursue a career in IT until 2021 when I started a course in App Development at KHY in Stockholm.
 There I was able to expand on my self-taught knowledge in programming ( C++, Java, HTML, Javascript and the Unity Game Engine), learning Kotlin, Swift,
 Android Studio, XCode, Git, Github, API and Databases, Native Development, Bug-fixing, responsive web-design, Architectural models (MVC, MVVA, MVP) and Agile based work-models.
 Beside everything listed before, my two years program gave me the opportunity to apply all of the above in a practical way through personal and group projects, some of those presented in this app.
 Other then technical knowledge I have a very curios mind, good problem solving skills and I try to be as helpful as much as possible to everyone around me. Even if I prefer to do most of my work alone.
 Because of my previous work experiences I have developed great social skills beside being able to speak and write fluently in three languages (Italian, English and Swedish).
